About me

I am an INRAE Senior Researcher in statistics co-leading the lab UMR 518 Université Paris-Saclay/AgroParisTech/INRAE.
My research mainly focuses on Statistical learning (sparse methods, latent variable models, clustering, graphical models, ...) applied to the analysis of data from life sciences, more particularly omics data. More on this can be found in my Habilitation à diriger les recherches.
Here is a full academic CV (April 2020)
